page.title: 18TWICKENHAM SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: We have a large shopping centre in Twickenham. The largest shop is{ {International},it is 4-5years old. Apart from International we have{ {Shopper's Paradise}which is another food shop. We also have{Coombes}and two{Belmonts}which are bakeries.{King {Street} is our main shopping area The shops in that street sell food and drink, clothes and shoes, household supplies, materials and stationery. There is a chemist and four hairdressers. Among the shops we have 4 banks and a few building societies. There are 10 restaurants in Twickenham ranging from Chinese to Indian. One of the children in our class lives in an Indian restaurant in Church Street. There are also a few take away shops such as{Wimpey}(which one girl in our school owns) a{ {MacDonalds} and a fish and chip shop.
